title: Listen to steel
creator_credit: Interfilm, Film Producers Guild and Daniel Ingram
brief_description: Presents an impression of dynamic British industry. Illustrates the latest developments in plant and processes throughout the country, underlining the modern techniques and up-to-date equipment now being used to increase production and reduce costs.
creator_credit_for_label: Interfilm, Film Producers Guild and Daniel Ingram
